headline: Assessing RTX (RTX) Valuation After Strong 1 Year Gains And A Recent Pullback
summary: Key recent performance markers for RTX (RTX) RTX (RTX) has been drawing fresh attention after a recent daily share move of about a 2.8% decline, prompting investors to reassess how its current price compares with recent gains over the month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for RTX. That 2.8% daily share price decline comes after a 7.9% 30 day share price return and a 10.3% 90 day share price return. The 1 year total shareholder return of 59.1% signals stronger longer term momentum...

headline: Is RTX Corporation (RTX) the Best Defense Stock to Buy in the S&P 500?
summary: RTX Corporation (NYSE:RTX) is among the 10 Best Defense Stocks to Buy in the S&P 500. On January 14, RTX Corporation (NYSE:RTX) announced that its small satellite manufacturing subsidiary, Blue Canyon Technologies, had launched a satellite to support NASA’s Pandora mission. The Saturn-200 minisatellite will conduct studies on exoplanets’ atmospheres and when they transit, especially […]
